title: BeerScript - April Edition
details:
Details
-------

JavaScript, CoffeeScript, ToffeeScript, TypeScript, SoundScript, PureScript, ECMAScript... How about BeerScript?

It's been so long that we've almost forgotten how to do it!

Join us at the Town Crier pub's upper level for over 50 beers on tap from around the world and a great selection of imported bottles at very good prices.

Socialize and network with other members of the community and discuss which flavour of JavaScript you like the best.

See you there!
